location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ābu] to James Dawson Macdonald

mods.abstract: Letter supporting Macdonald's project to further his force and sending on his official letter concerning the artificer's company.The letter goes on to inform Macdonald of the movements of both Pelly and his camp and his hopes of being in Nusseerabad [Nasīrābād] before the end of September and of seeing Macdonald there.
